Reviews.Title: The best tablet i ever owned!
Reviews.Author: Robert Clark
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet to replace a cheap china made tab called a mica tablet that I paid all most $200.00 bucks for.I didn't realize I could of bought a kindle fire for what I paid for the cheapy. I almost bought the fire but I came across Le pan 2.After I did some research for about two months, I decided to give a try.I am so glad I did.This tablet kicks @$$.I needed a dual core device that was fast and powerful. I am a beat maker who is always on the go and needed something to run Caustic and Supreme Mpa music production apps on.The Le pan can run both apps at the same time without a hickup,glitch or laging.It has sturdy solid feel,no cheap plastic here,super fast,great touch responce,excellent size,shape and profile.Over all a really great product.If people are having wifi problems their is a update that just got released today by Le pan.I just downloaded it and it is for the wifi fix and blue tooth.I got the update from a forum site just for Le pan tablet owners.Here is the web site [...]  They also have a 30 pin to HDMI cable coming in may or June.ICS will be released in may.Remember they are a new company and people need to give them time for fixes and accessories. I did not purchase the le pan 2 from amazon because I didn't want to wait a month to receive it,so I purchased from Newegg.

Reviews.Title: terrible and returned but for whatever reason got it back from UPS?
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Waste of money. It froze time and time again. Also no way to use this if you dont go to wifi hotspots. I bought this to use in church and could not because no wifi or internet access. It froze up at least once an hour and when i was at home i would lose wifi connection and have to reboot a lot. If your looking for an ereader this one is great but other then that it is useless. I also asked for a refund and returned the package only to get it delivered back to me the next day. So now I have to go back to the UPS store and resend it again. Urgh when your experiencing morning sickness this is the last thing you want to do ever. I dont think I would be willing to get any other tablets at this time.

Reviews.Title: Freezes frequently
Reviews.Author: shamsul alam bhuiyan
Reviews.Content: since day one screen freezing frequently. in the back there is reset option(small hole in the back), so far i have been poking to restart every time. managed to keep a paper clip with this tablets. showed my 7 year old son how to poke with paper clip when screen freezes. he is willing to keep and use it still. so far havent decided to return, since my 7 yr old son willing to use the poking method in reset hole.i have ipad too, my daughter dropped it few times, screen crakes 100 pieces, placed clear tape. still touch screen works better than le pan tablets.le pan touch screen also slow some times. definitely for kids, wont not recommened. also felt price too high, compare to level of defects.i have seen my friends black berry play book, still much better price wise.update:3/30/2012still son wants to keep it. bought a leather cover, made a hole behind where he poke the reset button many times a day when ever screen freezes(happens 5-10 times every day). what can i do, since he likes it.he also keep a paper clip.

Reviews.Title: Great inexpensive tablet
Reviews.Author: ethan vyce "ethanvyce"
Reviews.Content: Le Pan TC 970, 9.7" tablet, Android 2.2.I have only had this tablet for a few days (I will update in a few months if necessary)but so far it is great. The touch screen is very responsive, the on-screen keyboard works well. The WiFi was super easy to setup. Connected to the Android Marketplace easily/ quickly. Skype works well, Netflix, Facebook, Adobe pdf, all good. It comes with a 2GB MicroSD. The Home, Search, and Return buttons on the bezel work well.The camera is not great, but I'm not planning on using that much. The native web browser is OK. The screen display is fine. It does feel a tad heavy, but not terribly so. The packaging did leave a little glue on the backside; it took about 5 minutes of rubbing to remove it. I have read about freezing issues, so far I have not experienced that. I did email Le Pan's Customer Support asking about the firmware upgrade; they responded the next day with the answer.Apparently there is a new version of this which allows you to upgrade to new Android (this is stuck on 2.2 without heavy manual work) not sure what other advantages it has.I have a little experience with an iPad and this is a little smaller and I think a bit heavier. The screen is not quite as nice and I think the camera is much worse. Other than that I don't see much operational difference. Of course the Le Pan is several hundred dollars cheaper.**UPDATE**We have now had this about 4 months. Still very happy with it. No functional problems, battery life is still good. The screen does get fingerprints, but not really noticeable when in use. Still 4 stars.

Reviews.Title: Defective batch?
Reviews.Author: Steveny
Reviews.Content: Hi all,I just received the Le Pan 2 from Amazon.ca.  I ordered on the 22nd and it arrived on the 25th!  Super fast for free shipping!3 issues right away:- light bleeding on the bottom right and left corners- one dead pixel (ok, its one dead pixel, but for straight out of the box, I'm not expecting this)- wifi issue (signal drops from 18M to a steady 6-1Megs - in front of the router!)Regarding the wifi issues, I've tried the following:- changing encryption type, wep, wpa, wpa2, etc.- chose strongest channel within range (using tomato firmware on router and openDNS)I could live with the first 2 issues, but slow browsing, streaming video has soured this experience.I'll write a more positive review once these issues are resolved.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY THIS TABLET!!!! WORST COMPANY EVER TO DEAL WITH
Reviews.Author: Anthony J. Sabatino "Lori"
Reviews.Content: Do NOT buy this tablet!  This is the worst company I have ever "tried" to deal with.  I got this tablet for xmas.  Within 2 weeks we broke the cord.  I am looking to purchase another cord, not looking for warranty or a hand out.  There are apparently no accessories available ANYWHERE! We have called corporate for every dealer who sells this tablet to buy another cord and it is not available.  I contacted numerous times every email address available on the website of Le Pan with no return email.  The phone number on the website is simply a voice message saying to contact them via email or on the website with no opportunity to reach a human.  I created the request as the website says to over a week ago still with no reply.  The tablet worked fine while I had it charged, but if you EVER need service, you will not get it.  This is NOT a customer friendly company so I would not recommend ever buying anything Le Pan.  My brand new tablet is rendered useless thanks to the uncooperative company Le Pan.

Reviews.Title: Average android tablet for $198.99
Reviews.Author: Joncore "Jon"
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet in another site for only $198.99 for a gift to my cousin last black friday. DON'T BUY THIS TABLET IF THE PRICE IS OVER $300 THAT'S TOO MUCH FOR THE PRICE OF THIS TABLET.I mean there is more tablets options to choose for that price. Anyways, It is an average tablet running froyo 2.2 which is not bad for me but not impressive like the honeycomb 3.0. My cousin like it for basic use like internet, e mail, youtube, etc. The gaming mode is nice and smooth. If you are a geek that loves tablet this is not your gadget but if you are an average Gadget lover like me this will fit your budget. I would strongly recommend this product for a gift.

Reviews.Title: case for this great tablet
Reviews.Author: friend
Reviews.Content: I just recevied this Le Pan TC970 tablet two days ago.  It is a great tablet.  The reception of this tablet is weaker than the laptop I have at home.  For the case I would recommend this one  Technocel Leather Flip Book Case/folio for Apple Ipad (Black).  It was only $8.40 when I bought it.  The size is a slightly bigger than this tablet, but you can adjust their latches with hot air.  This is quote from one of the reviews of this case.  "Hot air solves the problem quite easily.Take a hair blowdryer and heat up the latches until they are pliable. This will make it easy to move the latches to the desired position to latch on to the TouchPad securely. It takes about 10 minutes with heating at regular intervals and manipulating to latches to fit perfectly. But after you are satisfied with the positions and put the TouchPad back in, you will be amazed at how perfectly and securely it fits."

Reviews.Title: One of the best android tablet on amazon
Reviews.Author: ymyam
Reviews.Content: I am very please with my le pan tc970 after some extensive use.  It is built very solid, with a super sharp screen and long lasting battery.  Android 2.2 runs smoothly with no hiccups, most apps run perfectly on the tablet.  For 1/2 the price of an ipad, most average users will experience comparable web browsing and reading experience.Maybe due to the limitation of android 2.2, streaming 720p video gets a bit choppy through web browser, but runs perfectly fine on the youtube app.Some 3D games with HD graphics do not work on this tablet, but whatever 3D games that run on this tablet run smoothly with good frame rate. (Most people don't buy a tablet to play 3D games anyway).  My mom has an acer iconia tablet for 2 months, but after using my tablet, she actually asked to trade hers with mine.In my opinion, if ipad 2 is the gold standard of tablet in terms of fun+function/price ratio, any android tablet cost more than $400 is overpriced. Consider the quality, ease of use and price of le pan tc970, it is definitely one of the best android tablets on amazon.  I think a lot of the shortcoming of this tablet is due to software limitation.  If there is an android 4.0 update for this tablet as the manufacturer promised, the hardware would be further optimized.

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: Hein Moritz
Reviews.Content: Very nice display.  Seems to be quite rugged. Long battery life. Have not found suitable externak keyboard, but I am dealing with the on-screen version fairly well. It is a good purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great for the Price
Reviews.Author: Johnny Roberts
Reviews.Content: bought this for my daughter,has market place and it works,download speeds are fast.great battery life, wifi is very good, 35ft away and going.gps works and updated.3rd party aps no problem, down load from computer easy,touch screen good,videos and games show very good on screen.paid 350 for this tablet and its worth more. and now price drops soon after even better, its a great buy...same size screen as hp and apple,what do you think about that...

Reviews.Title: Low quality
Reviews.Author: Butter Nuts
Reviews.Content: Bought it for my brother.  It broke within 6 months.  Would no longer start up.  Very disappointed in the value for the price.

Reviews.Title: Great product for the price!
Reviews.Author: Xquizit905x "Goddess"
Reviews.Content: I am please with the performance considering the price. The Le Pan is fast and efficient. I can surf the net, access email -everything. It was worth it!

Reviews.Title: Love mine!
Reviews.Author: SPG "spg"
Reviews.Content: My husband and sister has an Ipad 2 but I am very pleased that I can upgrade this up to 84 GB. It's very easy to operate. Mine has Google Play on it and I can download games with no problem. So easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Wifi Stopped after 6 months.
Reviews.Author: Isaac Travers
Reviews.Content: The data cable stopped working after about two months.The wifi stopped working after about six months.I would re-flash its firmware to get the wifi to work, but I can't because the data cable doesn't work.If not for these two problems, this would be my favorite tablet, by FAR.

Reviews.Title: This is an excellent 10 inch tablet.
Reviews.Author: Leo Chandler
Reviews.Content: Good functionality. Much better than iPad 2. The weight is similar to iPad 1, a little bit heavy for reading.A minor issue is that it randomly reboots every other day.

Reviews.Title: Le Pan Tablet
Reviews.Author: Robert P. Dennis
Reviews.Content: Love the Le Pan Tablet I have had it for about two years now and have not had no trouble out of it. I would bye another just like it if something happens to it. Thanks for a great product.

Reviews.Title: Did not like this item. waste of money
Reviews.Author: Teacupbaby
Reviews.Content: I did not like this item.. the camera took terrible pictures.. and it had no flash.. and I wish it had a usb port so I could listen to my bible I do not see very well to read. Wish I had purchased something different. waste of my money.. if all you do is search google or check your email and facebook its ok I guess.. I should have researched better and bought something that suited me better..

Reviews.Title: Still works great.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "bbdd"
Reviews.Content: Still working great after 18 months of daily use.  I have no problems with WiFi.  I use in hotels all over the world without connection problems.. purchased a 32 g card separetly and have over 30 hours of tv and movies at my finger tips.Great for everyday use.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet!
Reviews.Author: ruben juarez
Reviews.Content: The boot time is pretty quick and the tablets responsiveness is wonderful. The tablet can handle a lot of resource intensive apps. The 8 gigs it carries inside is decent but since I bought the tab for gaming purposes I needed a little bit more memory. The higher end games run very smooth on the tab without any stutter or choppiness. The battery life as is expected with most android things is somewhat on the lower side and, the charging time is also relatively long. Although I haven't done an actual test on the charging time i'd say it takes about 8 hrs to fully charge from 30%. I do use a battery saving app and I usually get about 10 hrs of on and off use. Although if you use it for listening to music and web surfing you might get more out of the battery charge. The resolution  is great hq videos on youtube look great and it can play hd movies as well. The price is perfect although if someone wereconsidering buying a cheap tablet with great specs I might tell them to save up to buy the new amazon hdx 7" tab being $299 I think. Of course I don't regret buying it and would definitely recommend it to anyone looking into it.

Reviews.Title: it was ok
Reviews.Author: al. b.
Reviews.Content: it wasn't as good as I thought it was, was hoping for something like a Samsung, but it's more like a giant phone you can't dial, lol.

Reviews.Title: Really good tablet but
Reviews.Author: Brent Caldoron
Reviews.Content: the battery stop charging after 4 months so now this tablet is a is useless it have to be plug in to the charge to work and that sucks i really liked it now i don't because i am going to have to spend money on a next tablet

Reviews.Title: Old but Still Good.
Reviews.Author: nuismer
Reviews.Content: This Tablet is getting dated now, but I think it still holds up well against the more current tablets.  Has a great IPS screen.  Is still reasonably fast and full of features.

Reviews.Title: Great Video, Great AV Playback, Bad Microphone 4 Recording
Reviews.Author: Wordess Benita
Reviews.Content: I LOVE my Le Pan tablet. I feel let down by the makers though. They promised when they released this product that the Android OS would be upgradeable for free. Then they changed their minds. They should have at least done a DEEP discount, I'm talking the retail price for Le Pan 1, allowing registered owners to upgrade to Le Pan 2. The main reason I am reselling my tablet is I need to record for work. The microphone in the tablet is pitiful. It is of such low quality it isn't usable. I can't even Skype with it which is a far lower standard than what I need. The cheap mic would be forgivable if an external mic could be used. No such luck. No such upgrade.Otherwise the optics on this thing are fantastic! Gaming should be super fun. (I don't game.) I've been able to download Google apps and use them regularly. It connects to wifi easily. CAVEAT: Down try wiping and resetting because it retains the info for the original registrant even when you press factory reset. So, if you access secure information on the tablet you may want to strongly consider if you will ever want to resell.

Reviews.Title: Le Pan I Outstanding Tablet!! (Black Friday 2012 Deal)
Reviews.Author: S. Brower "Kitty Keeper"
Reviews.Content: I bought the Le Pan I tablet during the Black Friday shopping frenzy in 2012. So I've had this for almost a year and I am very impressed! This is my second tablet, the first was a no-name piece of junk purchased on eBay for about $100 - it was returned. This Le Pan I tablet is 180 degrees from the other one and I highly recommend it! The battery lasts a very long time, vivid graphics, excellent touch sensitivity, responsive, fast, reliable, even really good sound!!

Reviews.Title: The Le Pan is great!.
Reviews.Author: Chuck Hendrickson
Reviews.Content: This is my third one, the second one was stolen. My main problem is that when I turn it off and close the lid on the case it fires back up. Help!

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Douglas Paredes
Reviews.Content: I like this product. this  le pan II 9.7 Tablet met my requirements. This product is highly recommended for me.

Reviews.Title: Ask yourself the question "Why am I buying a tablet?"
Reviews.Author: SirHutson
Reviews.Content: I have had my LePan for about 3 years now.  I had an iphone, I didn't want an Ipad because i felt like it was more of the same. I wanted the freedom of Android on my tablet.  When I saw the price tag on this tablet, i was weary. But, it was so cheap i had to find out for myself.  Here is a list of things that i have found to dislike about my TC-970.1. The tablet is running Android 2.2 "Froyo" that is the best it will ever do... period.2. Nothing is optimized for a tablet. It thinks it is a large phone with no service. apps are streched out or run in a small window...3. The volume down button broke about 9 months into owning it. (there is a volume slider in the settings so that isn't much of a hassle, however you have to use the volume buttons if you ever need to do a factory reset or upgrading firmware... I cannot do that anymore because i cant press "down" to select factory reset.4. For some reason after an extended time, the date/time goes out of sync and web pages and youtube and netflix stop working for "security certificate validation".  Again, easily fixable but annoying.5. The speakers are horrendous... Im talking TERRIBLE. and im not some audiophile who nitpicks. Sounds like the speakers are left over from an old speak-and-spell.So, ask yourself "Why am i buying a tablet?" If anything i have listed above seems like it should be something a tablet should do better. Find something else.

Reviews.Title: TABLET
Reviews.Author: Linda  Rogers
Reviews.Content: I AM STILL TRYING TO EDUCATE MYSELF ON USING, I AM NOT  USE TO THIS TECHNOLOGY.  WISH IT CAME WITHBOOKLET EASIER FOR ME TO LEARN

Reviews.Title: Fantastic...
Reviews.Author: Optimus913
Reviews.Content: Tablets for anything you might need it for.  Myself and my wife love watching Netflix or Skyping with our daughter and son.

Reviews.Title: Best Buy Ever!!
Reviews.Author: Sandra Wallgren
Reviews.Content: This tablet it awesome, sleek, and works great. I love it and would definitely recommend it to my family and friends. I also got my husband use to it, and now he wants one!!!

Reviews.Title: most for your money
Reviews.Author: reeange
Reviews.Content: love this lepan tablet.. you can use as u wish and add apps as u wish and never worry if its apple approved !

Reviews.Title: Expected longer life
Reviews.Author: ozzie
Reviews.Content: Expected this tablet to last longer than it has. Have owned this for less than a year and a half and it will not re-boot. It began to be quirky when I would need to re-set it. Sometimes it would not re-set without plugging into charger after doing the re-set button. This had nothing to do with it's level of charge, which was always kept ok.Customer service suggested different procedures. Non worked and when they instructed me to upgrade the firmware. I realized this was going nowhere as it has to boot up to do that.So with a cost of $100 + to do any repairs Le Pan has become useless to me.

Reviews.Title: Le Pan I Review
Reviews.Author: thirdparty
Reviews.Content: The Le Pan 1 is a fine tablet at 9.7 inches. The complaints are small but they keep me from rating it 5 stars. The first complaint is that the tablet comes with android 2.2 or froyo and the OS is not updated unless you can root the tablet. I decided to forgo rooting the tablet because frankly, I don't need issues this early in the game. The table only has 1/2 gig of ram. I would have preferred a full gig. Besides that, the tablet was a real bargain and who can complain about that?

Reviews.Title: As Described
Reviews.Author: Tung Lam
Reviews.Content: Came great with prime.As described. No external damage and everything was in working condition. I think I might buy another one.

Reviews.Title: Le Pan I
Reviews.Author: SYS
Reviews.Content: I've had my Le Pan I for about a year and a half.  It has had problems with freezing from the beginning.  Recently it stopped connecting to wi-fi, so I can't access the internet.  Pretty useless now. Don't think I can recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Too bad they don't stand behind it!
Reviews.Author: marie
Reviews.Content: (1) The first thing I have to point out is that the ONLY poorly made part of the tablet is the charge cord, the cord literally fell apart, IT takes  30 pin connector that is just slightly different from most 30 pin connectors available on the market so you pretty much have to buy it from Le pan ( they should just improve the design and give them to anyone who bought the tablet that came with their original cord.(2) THE BUILD QUALITY OF THE TABLET IS TOP OF THE LINE( EXCEPT THE CORD...WHICH FELL APART )(3) Their tech "support" has great hours......if you work there , if your a customer their hours are terrible! 7am-5:30pm MON-FRI when you call expect to spend a LOOOONG time on hold, eventually you will talk to a real live person, they will be polite and seem helpful, but then when the tome comes you can expect to receive an email giving you a lame excuse about why they REFUSE to honor the guarantee.(4) again it's a great tablet .......until you have an issue with it then it becomes a waste of hard earned money,

Reviews.Title: Great alternative to and IPAD
Reviews.Author: Chiquita Bradford
Reviews.Content: I LOVe it way cheaper and can do the same things without being stuck to Apple programs. I love it

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet
Reviews.Author: Old Student
Reviews.Content: I'm using my tablet to write this review. I love it, plain and simple. I'm new to tablets but it's so fun and easy to use. I like the large keypad. A great investment.

Reviews.Title: Not worth the aggravation.
Reviews.Author: Lloyd Toffey
Reviews.Content: Wanted an inexpensive tablet for my 80 year old mother to play games on. Paid $29 additional for a SD card and it still won't download games. Nothing but error messages. I may be returning this, lesson learned.

Reviews.Title: nice tablet
Reviews.Author: owendy
Reviews.Content: I own several. lepan tablets. This tablet doesn't play netflix movirs. still a fun fast tablet. my granddaughters love using this. tablet. would recomend it highly .

Reviews.Title: Returning all 3 le pans
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I had Le Pan 1 for 15 months and absolutely love it. Had no issues so far.Finally after 15 months the screen went blank, I decided to upgrade to Le Pan 2.Not sure what happened with Le Pan 2. I was totally impressed with version 1and when the time came for an upgrade, Le Pan was my obvious choice.So far I've tried 3 of them and I'm returning all 3.1) First one, the touch screen was not responsive.2) Second one, slow wi-fi connection3) Third one, wi-fi connection is very flaky. Initially I got a very slow connection  speed. Then it got better. After using for 2 days, again I'm seeing the slow  connection speed. Any search on google takes for ever and I usually get  time out message.I've other devices which can connect to the same wifi router and connection speedis fine.I'm willing to go with Le Pan if I can get a working tablet with no wifi issues....Update: I wanted to add that other than wifi I had no other issues with the Le Pan 2.No issues with downloading the apps ( when I can connect), touch screen...I likeeverything about it. It'd be a good upgrade, if it works.

Reviews.Title: Don't buy it, unless you want to have constant connection problems.
Reviews.Author: Jay
Reviews.Content: The damn internet connection never works on this sucker! 've had my connection checked multiple times and it works fine on every computer in my house, cept this tablet. I returned my last one for a new one, which they replaced free of charged, but shipping it to them cost me $30. So that cancels out. My new one works fine for a little while, before it starts having problems with internet connection as well. I don't recommend buying this at all! If a tablet has no connection, its pretty much a useless screen. Mine sits on a shelf somewhere in my house gathering dust.

Reviews.Title: worked for a couple months
Reviews.Author: furconicus
Reviews.Content: It has a one year warranty, but the power button failed very quickly and apparently it is a very common problem with this product.

Reviews.Title: Solid large screen Android Tablet
Reviews.Author: KeepItSimple "Jay"
Reviews.Content: Purchased this for a non computer savvy person in my family. Well built, executes as a modern Android device should. No complaints at this point--as advertised quality 2d tier tablet.

Reviews.Title: KEEP YOUR MONEY
Reviews.Author: DEBORAH BRYANT
Reviews.Content: This tablet is bs I got it as a gift for my mother. YouTube didn't work or it kept loading. Oovoo didn't work. Pandora worker the web ran slow. I got a refund. This tablet was a big big disappointment seriously save your money

Reviews.Title: it works great i will tell every one to buy this tab ....because its the best tab i had so far. i think its better then the ipad

Reviews.Title: Don't spend your money.....
Reviews.Author: reviewless
Reviews.Content: This tablet was purchased at one of those quick buys. It was great at first, but only worked about 2 months then quit, and had not worked again. I am fairly tech savvy, but I could not even get it up and running again.I would NOT recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet!
Reviews.Author: Jason Brooks "cbr900"
Reviews.Content: This tablet has lots of screen realestate.It def doesn't feel cheap, however if you buy this tablet GET A COVER!!!!I cracked the screen 72 hours after receiving it... it still works and I love how quick it is even for yesterters day tech.anyway, aside from it being very fragile its a great tablet for the money..next time for me will be something with gorilla glass...

Reviews.Title: Great Android tab
Reviews.Author: Hollywood
Reviews.Content: I love this tablet! Its a great product and so far it has been working flawlessly. The only thing is that it doesn't have any flash player. I can't install it cause it's not compatible with this device. But I can still watch and download movies from my favorite sites. So no worries.Bought it from amazon and it was shipped quickly and packaged safely.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet
Reviews.Author: Jacob Rueda
Reviews.Content: The Le Pan II GB Tablet is a great tablet especially for the price.  It is exceptionally fast and very easy to use. I can't wait to buy their next upgrade tablet the Le Pan III that will have both front and rear cameras.

Reviews.Title: Gift for someone else
Reviews.Author: Darlene Lou
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for soeone else, and they have used it a lot and have really really enjoyed it.  would do it all over again.

Reviews.Title: great tablet
Reviews.Author: vincesanity
Reviews.Content: This is such a great tablet. Maybe even better than an iPad. The only bad thing is that it has no back camera, but overall its a five star tablet. Get it while you can!

Reviews.Title: This is a great tablet
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "freefarid"
Reviews.Content: I bought 2 of these tablets, $150 each. They are extraordinary in terms of functionality and affordability. It can do whatever an average user would like to do such as browsing websites, using it as a communication device(you can send emails, texts, pictures or call someone using Skype, Magic Jack app, Google Talk, etc) watching videos, playing games, using it as a GPS, and even create/edit/save MS Office files. My only dissatisfaction about this tablet is its support. Their support site is not dynamic and is almost one way communication.

Reviews.Title: great tablet
Reviews.Author: SuesAna
Reviews.Content: This tablet is fast and has a lot of features. The volume is loud and clear. It's affordable. The only con is that the battery time is short but it does charge fast.

Reviews.Title: Good Tablet
Reviews.Author: Carlos Brito
Reviews.Content: Very nice and fast. I havent used that much, but so far so good. I recommended it for the price.

Reviews.Title: It's a great tablet.
Reviews.Author: Kathy
Reviews.Content: It actually does almost everything that a IPad does but at a lower cost. I bought one for myself last year and loved it so much I bought a second one for a gift. It's easy to use, easy to download apps, easy to buy anything. For a great 9.7" tablet, you need to get this one.

Reviews.Title: Le Pan II 9.7" Tablet, Ice cream sandwich
Reviews.Author: PLittle
Reviews.Content: I took a chance on this tablet and I was not dissapointed at all. I believe I got more than I bargined for, in a good way. Since I'm new at this I didn't want to spend alot, so when recieved it I used it as much as possible and I still haven't used all it's features. Thanks, PLittle

Reviews.Title: Okay while it lasted
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I loved this little tablet with all its quirks ~ freezing up often and loudly, turning on only with a paperclip... but then, after 8 months on this earth, it died. Bought a different tablet today. Wish me luck!

Reviews.Title: Great tablet for a reasonable price.
Reviews.Author: Abdul Purnell Askew SR
Reviews.Content: This tablet has exceeded my expectations.  The screen is very bright and vibrant, its processor is very fast.  Video playback is excellent.  I find myself using this tablet for everything from surfing the web to creation of documents.  Another plus point is that is has Android ICS on it, which in my opinion is way better than the previous versions.  I like the metallic styling, seems more durable than the plastic casings most tablets have.  The touchscreen is very responsive &  quick.  The battery life is excellent, I can use it almost all day with a full charge, this include watching lots of videos.  I don't care too much for the camera on it,  it's lacking, but I dind't buy the tablet because of the camera so it's not a big disadvantage for me.  I was frustrated when I found out the difficulties involved with getting picasa albums to sync with the gallery, but once I got it to sync it's been no problems since.  I really don't know how I got it to sync, but I went into the gallery and saw that my picasa albums were synced.  The keyboard is also nice, its keys well space for my big fingers & paired with the very responsive touch screen make it second nature to type on, to me it feels almost like typing on my desktop keyboard.  I can't wait to find out the endurance of this tablet, I'm hoping it will last a long time.03/14/2014: After a year I'm still pleased with this purchase.  The tablet works just as good as it did when I got it.  The battery life is great, I use this tablet more than my PC.  My only gripe with it is sometimes it's slow to come out of sleep mode, other than that I'm overly pleased.  I'm thinking of purchasing about 3-4 more.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: I love this thing.  The Le Pan Tablet is great.  It provides smooth operation, and the battery life is awesome.  I recommend this tablet to anyone that is looking to buy a tablet for a GREAT PRICE.  I can't get over how wonderful this device is. A+++++++++++

Reviews.Title: decent starter tablet
Reviews.Author: easydoinit
Reviews.Content: Nice size screen, light, built in flash, player good memory (expandle) all for a resonable price pointWould consider another le pan product.billw....

Reviews.Title: great product and delivered on time.
Reviews.Author: William
Reviews.Content: I was recommended the Le Pan by someone else after I had bought one from top name store with nothing but problems . It was delivered on time and so far no problems. I am real pleased.

Reviews.Title: SMH -useless
Reviews.Author: Cee Cee
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tablet for my daughter. She loves reading,  playing abc mouse and Android games... My thoughts were perfect with this purchase I can regain control of my cell phone and my laptop.Boy was I wrong... The tablet it self is good, a minor flaw freezing, once you reset it it was good...Okay now my issue... the CHARGER we have purchased over 9 chargers within a years time. The chargers are of POOR quality. My daughter have not gotten the chance to really utilize the tablet due to these disposal charges that cost $15.99 each!!I would not recommend this product due to the issue with the chargers. Put the extra money yo it and get a Kindle HD.

Reviews.Title: Better than great for the price
Reviews.Author: Luis Alberto Galindo Cota
Reviews.Content: Had it for quite some time and it works solid. Its limitations are obvious given the price range of the device (you can read them on the specs).

Reviews.Title: charger tablet on port easily breaks!!!
Reviews.Author: teela
Reviews.Content: No complaints on the tablet itself, wonderful design.However I'm on my 2nd tablet in 4 months because the charger port on the tablet is poorly made. The connectors on the inside smash down, even from gently plugging it in.& its a NIGHTMARE dealing with lepan customer service for the le pan S

Reviews.Title: Bad News
Reviews.Author: Carlton V. Johnson
Reviews.Content: I had to send it to Canada for repair or replacement. Le Pan still has it. The on/off button stopped working. I could only get the tablet to respond by inserting a paper clip end into a pin hole which would reset it. The on/off button was not functioning at all.  I am concern now as to how long the returned tablet will last before problems appear.

Reviews.Title: Bad Power Button, No response from Customer Service
Reviews.Author: Disappointed
Reviews.Content: Bought our 1st Le Pan and were so pleased we bought a second on so both our kids can use one.  Power button on the newer unit broke soon after we got it (something we see many others have experienced problems with) and months have gone by and we've not heard anything from Le Pan about repairing the item that's covered under warranty.  Only message we've received is an "automated email" offering us direction on how to power on the unit (since apparently the word search by the auto response picked up on our mention of the power button being a problem).  Really disappointed because we have a "brand new" unit that we can't power on...

Reviews.Title: le pan
Reviews.Author: yoseph tufa
Reviews.Content: I have received this item on timely matter but make sure not to break the power cord because it will be hard to find one that fit. I have ordered one from amazon that didn't fit. I am still looking.

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: STEPHEN
Reviews.Content: Best tablet for the money!!! I tried 3 others and kept returning them because they sucked but NOT this one.

Reviews.Title: Very Nice Tablet
Reviews.Author: Todd Gale
Reviews.Content: Everything is as expected. Tablet is a very good deal for the money. Nothing bad to say at all. Would recommend to everyone

Reviews.Title: Does not turn on, regardless of troubleshooting procedures.
Reviews.Author: ERIC WALTER
Reviews.Content: Bought for Christmas. Constantly freezes or has issues powering up. Now it does not turn on, regardless of troubleshooting procedures I try. Rest button, etc...nothing works, including the tablet.DO NOT PURCHASE PIECE OF JUNK!!! Spend the extra money on a quality tablet!!!  BUYER BE WARNED!!!

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: RHONDA MERTZ
Reviews.Content: I love it. Great value. Perfect for my family. I am not afraid to let the kids play with it. It was affordable so everyone can enjoy it. I have had no problems with it. I surf the web play games and do my bill pay and banking. lightweight and perfect for travel.

Reviews.Title: Worked about 3 weeks
Reviews.Author: Debbie
Reviews.Content: I was very disappointed with this product. I purchased it as a Christmas gift. Within a month the power button went out. Within 2 months it won't even charger or turn on any more. Since it was a gift my return window expired quickly and I'm now left with a junk product.

Reviews.Title: Awesome sturdy tablet
Reviews.Author: Kellee M. Mullin-Ertl "Kel Ertl"
Reviews.Content: Have only had this fora couple days but so far really love it.  Easy to type on the keyboard as if it were a regular PC keyboard. Fast processes, amazing picture display quality. Fast web surfing. Only downside is you have to load adobe flash player from here[...] since the play store doesn't carry it anymore. Don't download the a manual help apps because their loaded with viruses. Overall I would HIGHLY recommend this tablet.

Reviews.Title: Got More Then Expected
Reviews.Author: Dr. WIL "Dr. William Conley Th.D., Ph.D."
Reviews.Content: I was not sure I would really like this product but from reading other reviews on here I thought I would give it a try - I sure am glad I did!This unit at times acts more like a PC then just an ordinary tablet PC. It easily reads Kindle books along with PDF files, surfs the Internet (built-in WiFi and Bluetooth), reads both Web-based and pop/smtp/IMAP email accounts, plays a wide assortment of games and is well integrated with most all Google, Firefox, Opera and IE browser features. Has speech recognition, built in mic & camera along with many other common tablet PC features.A friend of mine was visiting and played with my Le Pan II for a couple hours and told me his iPad does less then this unit does and he was going to trade it in and get a Le Pan II.Now the only thing left to try is see how it's longevity lasts.... I highly recommend this device!

Reviews.Title: fun for first 4 weeks
Reviews.Author: aleaxandrite
Reviews.Content: I bought the le pan and it broke within 4 weeks, freezes all the time i sent it in andthey gave me another for free. I desided to sell it on ebaywhat a peice of jnk!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Hate it
Reviews.Author: sciortinosr
Reviews.Content: Tablet keeps "Hanging up" very hard to use - wife really gets frustrated trying to play her card games on it.

Reviews.Title: IT'S DOESN'T WORK :0( !!!
Reviews.Author: Alfredo Perez
Reviews.Content: A GIFT FOR MY NIECE AND THE FIRST DAY GAVE PROBLEMS, IT IS CHANGED, BUT AFTER A MONTH ALSO GAVE THE NEW PROBLEMS, NOT CONNECTED TO THE INTERNET AND NEITHER CAN OPEN THE STORE TO PURCHASE APPLICATIONS.

Reviews.Title: one star rating is too much for this product
Reviews.Author: BARBARA
Reviews.Content: This is the worst product that I have purchased. It goes to the web page it wants to, turns on when it wants, is not at all consistant so that you can at least fgure out what went wrong. At times it is super sensitive to you touch other times you can pound on it and nothing happens. I can not send an email from my email account and most of the time I have to fight it to even access my email. I do not recommend this product to anyone. I almost paid nothing and that was too much.

Reviews.Title: Great value... for 6 months
Reviews.Author: CP
Reviews.Content: This was a really good, somewhat simpler tablet--great for first time buyers or people who don't want to get something too fancy, but after 6 months of at best moderate use, the "hard buttons" on the right just totally stopped working for no reason at all (so  you can't back space or switch b/w apps, which pretty much renders it useless). After total reset, they still don't work and worse yet, even though it's under the 1-year warranty the company is horribly slow (like almost 2 weeks) at even responding to the email you have to send them just to get instructions to return it.  I'm even suspecting1-raspy voiced woman I talked to twice may be the only worker there!

Reviews.Title: Good for a year
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Bought this about 18 months ago.  It worked good and I was pleased with it.  Especially after upgrading to Ice Cream Sandwich.  However, I have found that buying accessories for this is difficult because it isn't a "major brand" item.  Also, after one year of use, the 30 pin plug on the tablet broke and the pins bent in rendering the unit useless.  There isn't any support for repairing my tablet and nowhere in my city will even think of replacing the broken part.  I have purchased an ASUS Transformer to replace it and very pleased with it.

Reviews.Title: Cheaper than Apple
Reviews.Author: Laura Molluzzo
Reviews.Content: Just what I needed it's no Apple but definitely worth the money. I can't justify spending any more than this and I have enjoyed it.

Reviews.Title: Le Pan II 9.7" 8 GB Tablet with Android 4.0.4 Ice Cream Sandwich.
Reviews.Author: George Hughes
Reviews.Content: The advertisement that I used to determine my purchase was written to make you feel that it "came with" the Android 4.0.4 already on it.  Was not the case.  I had to jump through some hoops to get it downloaded and installed.  A step I was not expecting.

Reviews.Title: Don't waste your money!
Reviews.Author: M. Johnson
Reviews.Content: This tablet says it will Skype, however we tried and tried to no avail.  We downloaded new programs (vtok) and it still wouldn't work.  Then, it wouldn't charge.  At 2 weeks old the thing wouldn't work.  I don't recommend  this tablet to anyone.  It was a real headache trying to get it to work.  I ended up sending it back and getting another brand.

Reviews.Title: Awesome tablet!!
Reviews.Author: Miss T
Reviews.Content: Love my tablet its the best! The price was reasonable and the screen resolution is wonderful. I downloaded my Bible and love reading it on my tablet :-)

Reviews.Title: Poor customer service
Reviews.Author: Scott Sayson "Scott Sayson"
Reviews.Content: The Le Pan II was almost completely useless until Ice Cream Sandwich was released for it.  After that it was much better, but the Wifi still didnt work right and there were a number of other bugs.  Le Pan released a firmware fix for these problems.  The firmware fix was poorly identified and it was unclear whether or not it was for this tablet. It turns out that it was for the Le Pan II as well as the Le Pan S, but I was unable to update my tablet because the recovery was broken.I tried to call Le Pan support, but was cut off mid call twice and after that there was no answer.  I opened a trouble ticket from the Le Pan support website and recieved an immediate response stating that they would replace my tablet and asking for my address.  I responded with my address and then heard nothing.  I tried to go back to the Le Pan support site, but the link to it no longer worked.  Le Pan support was simply gone.After two weeks of this crap, I contacted Amazon and told them that Le Pan was not supporting the warranty on my tablet. Amazon was gracious enough to accept a return of the tablet even though it was well outside the Le Pan return policy. Amazon applies a restocking fee to all returned items after the thirty day window.  I only needed to contact Amazon and remind them that the item was defective and the restocking fee was also refunded.What have I learned from all this? Never buy a Le Pan product.  Since all this I discovered that there are a number of inexpensive Chinese tablets that being made in the same manufacturing facilities as the well known brands. Many of these brands are well known Chinese brands that have an excellent reputation. I have preordered an Ainol-Novo Captain for $220. It should be shipped in March. The specifications blow away most of the tablets available in the US.  Outside of a few tech weenies, people seem very happy with these less expensive Chinese tablets, and many are buying them for kids to do their homework. If you dont want to spend $400+ for a tablet, there is an alternative.

Reviews.Title: Not bad for the money
Reviews.Author: eric davis
Reviews.Content: Good item easy to root and update the OS to do even more. There is a entire website of people who have taken the time to develope software and tweeks for the tablet worth the money

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY!!!!!! WORSE CUSTOMER SERVICE EVER!!!!!
Reviews.Author: derek dyck
Reviews.Content: I purchased 2 of these, one from Amazon 2/2012 & one from Best Buy 3/2012 neither is working today. I never leave reviews but must inform consumers of this HORRIBLE PRODUCT, Customer service is pathetic & I cant believe they are still open, i have dealt with bad customer service before but nothing like this, I have been trying to get a hold of this company for over 4 months & have talked to them through email but they wont issue a RMA number which is what you have to have before you can return it. Let me also mention that I have already had one of the tablets fixed when i first purchased it within about 2 months of purchase the first one went out & it was a fairly simple process of getting it returned, in all it took about 2 months to send it in & get it back, but now its a completely different story & now have 2 broken tablets & cannot get a hold of the Le Pan by email, phone or website. DO NOT BUY!!

Reviews.Title: Cute little tablet
Reviews.Author: Shunda "I AM God's BELOVED destined for GREAT...
Reviews.Content: I received this tablet for Christmas. I like the fact that it is easy to operate. I downloaded all of my apps from the Play Store. Only problem it does tend to freeze and I have to reset it but I watch movies I use all of the social media outlets i.e. Facebook, Google+, Instagram, Twitter, etc..No bad for the price.

Reviews.Title: The Lepan has not given me any problems so far...
Reviews.Author: Shera Chess
Reviews.Content: I did get two of these products and one of them had to be returned due to a system error but the return was easy.This item is not very good at all runs very slow or it does not run at all. I want my money back but I think it too late.I am sure going to try!!

Reviews.Title: Nice Tablet with good price, but...........
Reviews.Author: R. Huang
Reviews.Content: Got as a gift for my hubby. It is a nice tablet. But it is pretty slow reading a pdf. file. It shows obvious delay when operating files. Returned to Amazon.

Reviews.Title: inexpensive quality product
Reviews.Author: Mike M
Reviews.Content: Purchased 1 for personal review. Looking for a  tablet that was easy for a group to use together in order to reduce the amount of papers distributed at a meeting.Purchased 10 more units. Costs were 140 dollars per unit and were delivered in less than a week.Purchase through Walmart because of their easy return policy.The power hookup is a little hinky.  Resembles an iPod's---  long thin plug in. But is not interchangeable.

Reviews.Author: Amanda Patterson
Reviews.Content: Compared to my ipad and now Kindle Fire, this is definitely at the low end.  Great looking screen and good speed on most programs.  However the touch screen would be a bit buggy and web pages were difficult to manage.  Some would fail completely.  Overall a decent tablet for the price.

Reviews.Title: Very delighted and surprised!
Reviews.Author: Isaiah 55:11
Reviews.Content: Purchased this one for my daughter. Didn't want to buy an overly expensive tablet but wanted to have one that did what she needed for it to do. I must say that so far I am very pleasantly surprised. It connected easily to our network and loads quickly. If this one works out fine, I will be purchasing a few more. So far...very happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: aweful!!!
Reviews.Author: sailinron "sailinron"
Reviews.Content: i have returned 2 of these both with problems they dont work have a history of problems thats why the price  thank god for amazon and thier great return policy

Reviews.Author: Marie O
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Le Pan II a couple of months ago, and I LOVE IT. It's a great product and does exactly what other more expensive competitors are doing. Plus, it uses Google's Android.... and we know everything from Google is awesome and will more than likely "rule the world".

Reviews.Title: Lepan I Review
Reviews.Author: Susan
Reviews.Content: This model is my first tablet and a I love it.  The battery lasts 6 hours.  It connects to my home wifi without any problems.  I play games review email and listen to radio. There are tons of free apps at the google play store..  The only thing I was unhappy with is you can't easily take photos as the camera is front facing for use with Skype.  I bought the extra sd card but havent needed it yet.  I just bought this same tablet for my husband.  I tried getting him a cheap tablet and it would'nt connect to the wifi.k

Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet from one of the Holiday sales promotions which gave a pretty good deal.I was pretty happy with it for the price and that the display was pretty nice. Customer service is a joke with this company. I have paid almost the same amount in shipping as I did for the tablet. I have had power issues will every single one. Some the power would not turn on, others the power cord(which is cheaply made) would not charge the tablet. I am about to cut my losses and buy her something that is not a waste of money. Reviews.Content: Even after expanding the memory to a 16gb, with a recommended memory card for tablets, it constantly froze! Every 10 minutes I had to reset it. So disappointed!

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet at a great price!
Reviews.Author: Caitlin "busy mom"
Reviews.Content: My 6 year old has been begging for an Ipad.  (Yeah right!!!)  So we started looking into tablets and found this one.  He's had it about 6 months and loves it!  He can do youtube, email, facebook, etc.  He has downloaded all the angry birds and other various games.  The flashplayer is great, it doesn't skip or anything.  The only thing that doesn't work is skype.  You can make calls with skype, but it doesn't do video chat, so that was misleading.  There is a camera, but it's on the back of the tablet.  It's also set up just like my android phone so my son took to using it with ease.  I downloaded the kindle app so he can read books.  I've actually borrowed it to read books on it myself!  Very happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Andrea
Reviews.Author: sandrea
Reviews.Content: I am not a techie  so I got this le pan versus other more sophisticated ones as a trial. the only problem i have is setting up calenders and cameras as I am not familiar with those operations in smart phones or other tablets. i did download the owners manual and that was some what helpful.

Reviews.Title: It was ok
Reviews.Author: soullesly
Reviews.Content: Well i ordered the Le Pan as a present, but when it came it would not turn on. I sent it back and it took a long time for them to replace it and have it shipped back to me. Anyway, the second one i got, I was surprised it worked! But it was a really good tablet, then 3 months later it completely quit on me! I could not replace it so i am not happy with it.

Reviews.Content: This tablet performs well otherwise, but it freezes like crazy unless you update the firmware.  Go to LePan's website and download the update.

Reviews.Title: lepan
Reviews.Author: mason
Reviews.Content: it arrived and so far works really well. I bought it for my husbands birthday and he's not all touch screen or shall i say digital savvy be he likes it better than the ipad one he was using. I give it a 5stars

Reviews.Title: great tablet great price
Reviews.Author: BTierney
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet for my husband for valentines day this year and over all he's been satisfied with it.

Reviews.Title: A piece of Junk with sorry customer service!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Mike Adams"
Reviews.Content: This tablet is the worst piece of junk I have ever seen. It worked good for the first month or two then the nightmare begin. I had to swap this tablet 4 times and went through heck to get someone on the phone each time. The company has only one line with no voicemail good luck talking to them. Their turn around time for exchanges is a painstaking 4 or 5 weeks and would have been longer had I not have called and threaten the with the better business bureau. Well it worked for awhile and crashed again and the screen started giving strange flashing problems. After several hours upon hours of frustration I finally said I had had enough. I shut the piece of junk down and threw it in a parts drawer because that is all it is worth. Do yourself a huge favor and stay away for this tablet, Far away. I am an IT support tech and have fixed some hard to fix computers and I did not have the patience to put up with this piece of junk.

Reviews.Content: GREAT FOR WEB BROWSING AND ONLINE GAMES. SLICK!! USER FRIENDLY.AWSOME FOR YOU TUBE.BIG ..S SCREEN FOR AGES 2-99YRS.NICE FOR THE MONEY

Reviews.Title: Nice tab, but too pricey now...
Reviews.Author: J. Helgeson
Reviews.Content: Late 2012 UPDATE:  Looks like the new price isn't coming down anytime soon.  Dropping from four stars to three, because once you get near the $200 price point, there are probably better options...-----Ok, so a couple of weeks back I picked one of these up for a buck thirty, right here.  A few days later, it listed for a buck fifty!  And now, a buck eighty?!  I mean, yeah, the tablet's actually pretty good (for a second-tier FroYo unit), but with its current price volatility, you might want to consider either other models or other vendors.As for specs, this one is a PDF reader's dream.  Well, ok, a 15" borderless unit would be perfect, but realistically, this is quite a solid runner-up, and a bargain (at least at its former price).  Yeah, it'll play video games, but remember, it runs FroYo (Android 2.2), so the OS is old, and I have no inclination to try upgrading it.  Frankly, I don't even see a need to root it.  If you just consider it a giant Kindle with the Google Play store installed, you'll be pleased as punch with it.  With the current incarnation of Adobe's PDF reader app, if you set the page-view to "Continuous," there's no need to reflow anything.Other than the occasional freeze or lockup, which frankly happens to all 2nd-tier units at some time or another, the only real issue I've encountered (and I think this may be the issue in some of the negative reviews here) is that you ABSOLUTELY HAVE TO charge the battery fully before using it.  It comes a bit precharged, and the battery life is great (which probably explains the heaviness), but if you let the power run all the way down, the thing won't power up enough to even start a proper recharge cycle for like an hour.  It's a PITA, but the fix is easy--just don't ever let the battery level drop below ~15%.  And speaking of charging, it takes quite a while, and the socket's proprietary, but rumor has it you can use a standard 15-pin iPod charging cable, if you shave off a bit of plastic from the sides.  I've never tried, but honestly, LePan sells replacement cords for so cheap, why bother?Other things:  Remember, it's running FroYo, so NO EQUALIZER.  (Sux if you're an audiophile.)  Also, it'll fit an iPad case just fine, but the I/O holes and button spaces won't line up, so be prepared to use a scissors on the case if you go this way.So in a nutshell, for a buck-thirty, LePan's TC-970 is a great PDF reader.  At its buck-eighty inflated price, though, you might as well check out some 1st-tier tabs that run 4.0+ (Ice Cream Sandwich, Jellybean, etc.).

Reviews.Title: Cute but slow
Reviews.Author: Lus
Reviews.Content: I like everything about it. Its cute and everything but everything is soo slow, i want to say is my wifi connection but mine is pretty fast..

Reviews.Title: already had to factorty reset
Reviews.Author: steve o
Reviews.Content: I love it perfect for the price and for what i wanted... touch screen is awesome fun to read books on.. i love that i can have all the aps from my phone plus i was worried about flash 11 not working... it updated to it right on the start up... i tried the firmware from the le pan site... dont bother it made it slower and no good came from it... over all size is great for movies and having around the house. Gps kinda sucks and  the speakers kinda remind me of a i touch or blasting headphones i love my le pan 4 stars since i already had to reset it... i should ad that android 2.2 is not so bad i think the fact that i know its not up to date  is the part that bothers me... skype pulse facebook games everything but a cup holder

Reviews.Title: Nice tablet for the price
Reviews.Author: DaveL
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a basic tablet to use to check email and surf the internet while on layovers, and the LePan II hits the mark.  It does everything I want it to do at a lesser price than the fancy tablets.  True, it may lack a few of the bells and whistles of those tablets, but why pay for features you don't need?  Sound quality is not great and buttons are tiny, but once you get used to it it works just fine.  I would make the same choice again, and am quite pleases with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet for the price
Reviews.Author: Luv2Shop
Reviews.Content: I had originally ordered the first version of this product then discovered it couldn't be upgraded to the most recent Android version so I cancelled and ordered the Le Pan II.  I have a desktop PC (used mostly for work) and a laptop that is heavy to lug around so wanted something more portable.  I have to say I love this table.  It has great features and is lightning fast and easy to use.  I brought it on a recent business trip and it allowed me to stay connected to home and the office.  I have a Kindle and the pre-loaded Kindle app on this table immediately synced to my Kindle allowing me to easily read my books on either device.  For the money it is a fantastic deal

Reviews.Title: 3 Stars Tablet
Reviews.Author: mars "Americanshores"
Reviews.Content: After getting more information about the LePan 2 Tablet,  I decided that I will give it only a 3 stars review.  Unfortunately,  I had to return the Tablet.  Here is why:  The LePan  2 Tablet, would work fine at my workplace but fail to perform at home.  While at work, I could download all kinds of videos from various sources like ABC, CBS, NBC, MSNBC.  At home,  the videos would not download for more than 2 or 3 minutes before stopping.  I even called AT&T; and had my internet speed upend to 6 mbps.  But alas, it did not work.  However, it would play YOUTUBE and NETFLIX just fine.  I have 3 laptops at home feeding from the same old router and they all work fine even with a lower mbps.  But the LePan 2 was being very selective at home on which videos would allow me to play.  Strange, because at work it really worked fine.  I was told that at work the Tablet works fine because we are super wired here at my workplace while at home, the LePan 2 Tablet might have some kind of bug in the Honeycomb system that makes it act like that.  Well,  for the price of this limited experience  I can buy  a laptop that will allow me to vision and play just about anything I throw at it.  Too bad, because the Tablet was kind of nice.  If you are happy just to use it as a great E-Reader, or casual video watching on YOUTUBE or NETFLIX, go for it.  It is great.  But if you are like me and want to enjoy the whole spectrum of videos available on the media system out there, then I would think twice before making the purchase.  I hope this has helped you to make up your mind about this very nice but limited Android Tablet.  LAST UPDATE AUG.15, 2012.  I have returned the LePan II Tablet and Purchased the Lepan older model TC970.  It is now on sale for $130 LESS than the Lepan II and works just as good as the most expensive version.  One thing I cannot do with the older model vs the LePan II, is that the older Lepan does not play the Smithsonian Channel .......Other than that, it is not worth the extra $130.  I am very, very happy with the former model of the LePan Tablet.

Reviews.Title: Or maybe five stars...
Reviews.Author: kilaueabart
Reviews.Content: Finally decided on a tablet instead of a netbook. Spent quite a bit of time looking at features, prices, and user reviews, and went for the newer Le Pan. I notice belatedly that I was asked to review a tablet with Android 4.0.4 while the one I purchased is at 3.2.1.I am very satisfied with it, and frequently amazed at what it can do. Maybe I am too naive about the technology, but though I knew about talking iPhones, I never suspected that I would be able to voice-Google with my new device.To avoid smudges as much as possible, I usually use one of those tablet "pens," and the Le Pan doesn't always get my first press. And I'll always prefer a full tactile keyboard over pressing pictures of typewriter keys, but after all I went for a tablet instead of a netbook, and too I don't have to type in order to google any more, so those are probably not worth a full one star deduction. Maybe I should give it five stars.

Reviews.Title: What I paid for !
Reviews.Author: JoeBrann
Reviews.Content: I bought my Le Pan II a few weeks ago and was quite pleased. This was a good buy !well worth the money! The only problem was the inability to use the HDMI feature. It seems the 30pin to HDMI connector was not designed well enough and tech support can only say "They're working on it"!I hope it's available soon. In the meantime I watch on my tablet. I am not disappointed. Expect the Le Pan III to have fixed that. I'll gift this to my wife and buy it !! Seem though that the U.S Market is resistant though. The tablet market needs better products like this one!Le Pan II 9.7-Inch Tablet (Black)

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet
Reviews.Author: Michael M Perez
Reviews.Content: Received it a few days ago, absolutely wonderful product and much less than an Apple II.  Using it to show 360 virtual tours to clients and they are amazed with it's speed and how clear images are.  If you're looking for a perfect fit case cover, get the CaseCrown Hard Cover Case - http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B004QJ3ML0/ref=oh_details_o04_s00_i00 - fits the Le Pan II perfectly.  Overall very happy with choosing this product!

Reviews.Title: very nice
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I was nervous about this purchase due to some of the bad reviews, but decided to give it a try. I've had mine for about 2 months. The price can't be beat. I have had no issues at all (except my Win XP computer won't load drivers, luckily I have a Win 7 that does). I have loaded books, games and apps without a hitch. No problem connecting to the internet via wi-fi (at home and in motels).The included start-up guide is very sketchy, what it doesn't say (and should), before you start using it, plug it in and let it charge overnight. That information is in the guide that is loaded on the tablet and is probably the cause of most of the problems reported in the reviews.PS don't be put off by the "3-4 months to deliver" estimate, the wait was only 3 weeks for me.

Reviews.Title: Doesn't freeze
Reviews.Author: Oleg Mikheev
Reviews.Content: UPD2: Went to their customer service in Fremont and they just gave me a new one. It appeared it had some issues with the usb port, due to this weird apple-style connector...UPDATE: after two months it stopped working, time to try out their customer service...I owned Le Pan I and I liked it, except for the frequent freezes that made it impossible to live with it, at least without a paper clip for the reset button.Le Pan II also features this reset button and it made me wonder if it would freeze as often. But to my surprise it wouldn't. Just one time WiFi got into some weird state and required to reboot the device to make it work.Battery life seems to be a little shorter than that one of its predecessor but it is still very good. Probably that's because of a more powerful processor, but it didn't seem to work a lot faster to me.So basically I had to pay extra $80 to get rid of freezes but I'm ok with it.It lacks HDMI output and it is not visible as an external drive when you connect it to your computer unlike Le Pan I - with this one you need to install drivers to copy files to it. But that's still MUCH easier than having to deal with copying files to iPad :)

Reviews.Title: Le Pan is very good tablet.
Reviews.Author: Greg
Reviews.Content: The Le Pan 970 is a very good tablet for the price. It has fast response just like my android phone, I can transfer data from my laptop to the tablet. The only thing I wish it had was a two way camera.

Reviews.Title: le pan tc 970
Reviews.Author: Jared
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet online and the only issue ive had was about 3 crashes (which were solved by simply pushing the reset button on the back).

Reviews.Title: May need to reset after a Full Charge!!!
Reviews.Author: Tech. Geek
Reviews.Content: This is an awesome tablet in comparison with the I-Pad... This was a good buy for the price. The only problems you may face is having to reset the tablet with a toothpick or some small tool after charging. It is interchangeable with any 30-pin charger. Video is not that clear, but for the price... hey you will love it.

Reviews.Title: really great for the price, solid quality
Reviews.Author: JibberD
Reviews.Content: Better than expected for $200. It is like my HTC droid incredible but big enough to see webages, photos...I am typing this review with the tablet and do find the keyboard a little tough...too big to use thumbs technique and too small and sensitive to be a standard keyboard. Other complaint is the proprietary 30 pin charger.Quality is amazing for this price. Sturdy, sleek and cool. Want to give 4.5 stars.I researched inexepensive tablets looking to buy my first and got this one based on reviews and price. I am not disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Good for the Money!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I was skeptical of ordering this because of some of the reviews but I am glad I did order this. I would have liked to get the updated one but money wise this was perfect. I ordered this for my husband to replace the tablet he lost. We were not disappointed. We actually like the slim look and feel. The USB part is a little different but it still had were you can connect a port. The colors are rich and clear on the screen. It connects great with my Hotspot on my HTC EVO. It's a good PC Tablet for the money.

Reviews.Title: Le Pan II is a great alternative tablet for the price!!
Reviews.Author: B. Sutton "Graybeerd"
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet for my son as a 15th birthday gift.  I did not want to pay $500 or more for an iPad or Android tablet, and this seemed like a well reviewed alternative.  I think this device is great for someone that is going to use it for entertainment or a laptop alternative focused on web based apps.ProsBattery lasts for hoursGreat screenThinCan be upgraded (someday) to ICSNot running some old 2.x Android sware out of the boxMicroSD availableQuick response time with graphicsNetflix runs like a champConsNo Hulu+ support.... but my opinion of Hulu+ is not very positive anyway :|Found a Targus Truss case for iPad Gen1 that fit just great and the boy is happy as a clam now since he wont need to lug around the old laptop I gave him from years ago.  Smudges and glare... you wont escape that with any of these devices IMHO.  Get an antiglare cover and go cry about something else :)You wont regret it if you are looking for an Android tablet that costs $200 less than the major market players.  Good luck and have fun.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet but?
Reviews.Author: jhbchristopher
Reviews.Content: Originally ordered off Amazon but due to the wait I purchased from Best Buy. Tablet has been great so far have been very impressed; only hardware issue is youtube buffering but that can be fixed by using Dolphin HD browser and setting it to ipad profile, also make sure the Bluetooth is off as they share the same antenna.Now for the "But?" The Lepan site (lepantab.com has been down for 3 days now, you either get redirected to google, unauthorized or page not found,  I would be a little leery about future support, ordering additional unique Lepan power adapters  and  the ICS update is also supposed to be out shortly, hopefully they are only having temporary problems as the tablet has been great. I would give it 5 stars if not for the website issue.Update after some cheecking the website is not down for everyone if your having problems accessing it can be accessed directly by going to [...]

Reviews.Content: Bought this tablet and was impressed the first day of use...but 3 days later i just wanted to toss it...it freezes up constantly and stalls way to much..i wasnt even using high performance website..overall the look, size and weight is beautiful but the system performance sucks..but hey you get what you pay for..im getting a refund imediately.

Reviews.Title: hanfam
Reviews.Author: hanfam
Reviews.Content: We purchased this after reading the many positive reviews.  We have found it easy to use.  About the only negative we could say would be that the low pixel camera makes it almost not worth having but other than that we have been very well pleased with its function, look and performace.  I would highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Nice Affordable Tablet
Reviews.Author: beelzebub
Reviews.Content: UPDATE: After doing the free upgrade to Android ICS (which was relatively easy) I am happy to report that I no longer have wifi issues - it connects fine everywhere.  Also, after checking the "allow plugins" option in FireFox Beta, I no longer have Flash problems either.  Changing the rating to 5*s now.  Hopefully, Le Pan gets more recognition so that there are more accessories out there altho LePanTab.com's store has gotten better.For the price, this tablet cannot be beat.  There are a lot of cheaper tablets out there but this has solid build quality (love the metal accents), sharp responsive screen (not sure if it is Gorilla Glass I have read that it is & some say it isn't), long battery life (over 8 hours) & has all the little extras built in like GPS.It comes with 1 30 pin cord & so far you can only order another thru the company itself.  Altho if you shave down the plastic parts on an Apple cord, it works.The downside of the tablet is that it takes a long time to charge (altho the long battery life negates that).  The buttons are rather small & hard to press on the curved surface but that is to be expected when you want this thing to be thin & light.  The speakers are on the back which can be muffled if laying down or in a case.  It has rebooted itself on me occasionally but the boot time is fairly quick so not that annoying (yet).Flash works just fine when I use the YouTube app but if a video is embedded in a website, it does not work - tried in both the default browser & FireFox.The biggest complaint is the wifi does not always work - altho I suspect it has more to do with the hotspot than the tablet itself (or at least the compatibility of the 2).  In most places, it connects immediately with no problems but when I am at work/school it will not pick up a signal or it will take hours before it does (altho my phone & laptop find it).  If it did this everywhere I would claim it defective but it is only in the same wifi areas so who knows ...This is my 1st Android product so not much to say there but I so far prefer Symbian as it communicates more with you - like letting you see what apps are running & stopping them w/out having to download an app.  Speaking of apps, there are soooo many in the Play Market that it can be overwhelming to pick which one to use.Got the Targus Truss case for the HP TouchPad which fits this perfectly.  Hopefully this brand will become more popular and we will start to see dedicated accessories that fit it without adding bulk/size.In sum, if you are looking for the cheapest tablet that is decent, reliable & all the bells & whistles, this is the one for you.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet

Reviews.Title: Le Pan 11

Reviews.Title: Not up-gradable to ICS - No voice tech support
Reviews.Author: Alton C. Owens "0zzark"
Reviews.Content: There is nothing posted that says this tablet is upgradable to ICS, so I can't figure where this expectation came from.  I've tried to call tech support 6 or 7 times in past 30 days they just don't have anyone but and answering machine.I think I'll keep this one (I had to return 2 others before getting one that worked) the price is not to backbreaking in cost, and what it does it does well.  There are lots of things I'd like to have but don't want to spend another 400$ to get them.Just understand before you buy this one there are limitations, and when you get a lemon you better return it promptly as long as Amazon stands behind them, and it would not surprise to see Amazon take them down anytime because returns are an extra expense too.In my book it deserves 2 stars, takes care of my needs for a tablet.  IT is fast compared to a HP Touchpad, but when the new crop tablets start arriving with 3 & 4 Cores this will soon be bringing up the rear.  IF this company is to grow they will have to offer support for users and become more open with their support policy, not just giving a short answering message to call back during some office hours they give.Good Luck just tread carefully its a mine field your treading in.April 29, 2012 postThink I've found the source of some of the rumors, some log on and give it 5 stars and after checking their other reviews they might post on other products, ---- they have none, so apparently they are from a source that has an interest in promoting this product they give it glowing report and then suggestions of great things to come without any way to check their source.  I can only speculate their motive and so my suspect is that these are just trying to start and or spread glowing rumors for the product that has no tech support and can't can't speak to anyone at the company they hide behind their email when they want to answer.So you figure, your assumption is just as good as mine.THIS is a good starter Tablet just don't expect any tech support or believe some of the glowing reports and promises of things to come,  For this reason don't consider buying it from anyone other than Amazon where you have their "Return policy" to pull you out if it don't work out for you.Alton C Owens

Reviews.Content: I received my Le Pan II about three weeks ago....To say I am impressed would be an understatement.  It arrived within a week as promised.  My device connected to the internet in under three minutes and I was up and running.  Downloads speeds were quite surprising as well as watching netflicks and U-tube. I obtained a nice tablet holder from Wilsons leather, which also fits the IPAD, it appears the majority of their holders also fit the Le Pan II, so it won't be hard to find.  Overall for the value of this product against the IPAD, it is well worth it.

Reviews.Title: Great value for product
Reviews.Author: RitaChristine
Reviews.Content: I bought my Le Pan tablet over a month ago, and I'm really enjoying it. The battery life is great, and it feels great to hold (doesn't feel cheap). I highly recommend buying a screen protector. Without it, the screen is very shiny and smudgy. But with it there are hardly any marks at all, and it takes away some of the glare. I'd recommend putting in a larger micro SD card. Sure, this tablet doesn't have the option to upgrade to the newest version of android, so the interface does just look like a jumbo android phone, BUT it does everything I want it to do. I can surf the web and watch videos, read PDFs/ebooks, play games, view photos (great integration with picasa web albums through your google account), and do email. Watching movies on the Netflix app has been awesome! The speakers on the tablet aren't even half bad. If you don't mind the old-school interface, this is the best tablet for your buck.

Reviews.Title: Great... when it works.
Reviews.Author: JFR
Reviews.Content: We bought this for our daughter's 8th birthday, despite mixed feelings because of the many negative reviews. It is really affordable, looks great, is easy to use right out of the box. It was fast, responsive, and fun. It even has a camera and pretty good sound, a big plus. Unfortunately, it started to freeze only days after we got it. Sometimes it would turn on; sometimes not. The battery wasn't the problem; it did hold a charge for quite a while. It just randomly froze without warning. Also, we started having lots of connectivity problems (on our home wireless wi-fi, when we had no problems on our other computers). After a few weeks, we finally threw in the towel and returned it to Amazon. We're not going to take a chance on it again; all the negative reviews unfortunately have proven true. We'll get another tablet, maybe the Kindle Fire.

Reviews.Title: Good value
Reviews.Author: ChazB
Reviews.Content: I was skeptical about buying an off brand tablet with an old Android version 2.2 but am very happy with my purchase.  Most if not all of the apps I use are compatible with the older Android version.  I considered an iPad but the cost was a lot higher and I was concerned about the greater loss if my young children were to break it.  Speed is good.  Be sure you upgrade to the latest firmware before you do anything else or install programs or data.  Also, I suggest you get a 16GB+ class 10 SD card since the stock card is too small and probably a lower class rating.  I would have purchased the Le Pan II but it was on backorder and I didn't want to wait.  I may purchase another Le Pan 1 or 2 because the kids fight over it and I need another.  Netflix streams fine on our house wifi.  The battery life is ok with about 6 hours on a full charge.  A friend asked if it would run Skype.  I don't use Skype but tested it with him.  The standard video Skype doesn't work but there are hacks you can find that are supposed to work.  I got it partially working but gave up when my friend got a laptop instead.  The camera isn't that good and only front facing but I don't use it.Primary uses: Games (Angry Birds, Where's my Water, for the kids), Movies, eReader (Kindle and Google), web browsing (Dolphin), email, children's educational software (story books, math, reading)
